Name: Frontend Development
Description: A comprehensive roadmap to becoming a front-end web developer, covering front-end technologies.

Name: Data Science
Description: A roadmap for aspiring data scientists, focusing on data analysis, machine learning, and statistical modeling.

Name: Mobile Development
Description: Learn how to develop mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms, including native and cross-platform development.

Name: Cybersecurity
Description: A roadmap to understanding cybersecurity principles, ethical hacking, and network security.

Name: Cloud Computing
Description: Explore cloud computing concepts, services, and deployment models, including AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.

Name: Game Development
Description: A roadmap for game developers, covering game design, programming, and graphics.

Name: Artificial Intelligence
Description: Learn the fundamentals of AI, including machine learning, neural networks, and natural language processing.

Name: DevOps
Description: A roadmap to mastering DevOps practices, including CI/CD, automation, and infrastructure as code.

Name: UI/UX Design
Description: Understand user interface and user experience design principles, methodologies, and best practices.

Name: Backend Development
Description: A roadmap for Backend developers, covering front-end technologies.
